title: Will of the Ancients 2019
body:
I think WotA could healthily exist as in option in today's League.

{{item:1026}} + {{item:1026}} = WotA
100 ability power
20% spell vamp 
Cost: 2100 gold

DoT and AoE spells would get full benefits from healing.
Doesn't stack with {{item:3146}} 
 
You'd be trading magic pen, cdr, waveclear, damage, grievous wounds and mana for more sustain.

Still wouldn't compare to {{champion:92}} {{champion:141}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} running around with {{item:3812}} and Ravenous Hunter, but it'd stop certain AP champs from being completely bullied out of lane while AD champs heal off the minion wave.

replies.body: Beyond the fact that the item is unreal cheap, vlad alone would be game breaking with its ap+20% healing.

It existed, was core, and was unhealthy as fuck so they removed it. Now you want to bring it back in an absurdly buffed form. 

Also, spell vamp behaves very differently than lifesteal due to the burst nature of AP damage, and shouldn't be compared outside of mages like Cass and rumble.

{{champion:141}} {{item:3812}} 
It's not life steal, its physical spell vamp.

Yep, and not only does it have an amazing buy rate of 1% on him, but since red is the only meta form, he spams q's, like Cass and rumble who I said were special cases. That item is also bought for the damage delay on bruises.
Lol this item is absurd. Already more than 100% gold efficient with just the AP. Lol dots and AoE get full benefit. This would actually be the most absurdly broken item in the game.

See reply to usul1202

Also a Wukong main, I don't think it's fair for me to bully {{champion:68}} (a hard counter) out of lane just because I rushed {{item:3074}} and {{item:3155}} and can get back to 100% health again if I manage my mana.
If you're still laning 1.5 items in plus boots and he hasn't already abused his advantage then he doesn't deserve it.

Not a single constructive argument made. It should be noted that I do not use AP champs at all, I play Wukong top/mid/jg/carry/support and I'm not a fan of stompfest just because i can out sustain my opponent with healing.

That is what you give up as an AP champion. AP champions are not supposed to be able to sustain as well as AD. Also if players are taking bad trades into you when you have sustain and they do not then they are misplaying. Certain classes and builds offer different advantages and disadvantages l. That is how a game like this works. What would be the point of having champions that all did the same stuff equally as well.
Morde would be bonkers with WotA back
He would never take WotA over GB.
